div.div:
To safeguard the health and wellness of students, staff, and the community we have decided to close Pleasantdale District 107 schools to students beginning Monday, March 16, with a projected return of Tuesday, April 7 (this reflects a one week period following spring break and anticipated travel from our community). This is a dynamic situation and the return to school date may change.
